title: Studio - Washer/Dryer, Full Size Appliances and Balcony! Apply Today!
neighborhood: 505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Full-Size Whirlpool Washer and Dryer', '-Spectacular Two-Story Entry Lobby', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool and Spa (Heated for Year-Round Use)', '-Basketball Court', '-Individual Apartment Balconies or Patios', '-Roof Top Pool and Spa with Spectacular City Skyline Views', '-Separate Storage Facilities', '-Fitness Center', '-Four Star Trac/Cybex Treadmills', '-Dedicated Gated Parking For Residents', '-Breakfast Bar', '-24-7 On-site Management', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA 90012', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Los Angeles,  USC Apartments,  Downtown LA,  DT Los Angeles Apartments,  Central LA Housing,  Elysian Valley,  Civic Center,  USC,  Fashion Institute Apartments,  Harvard Heights,  Toy District,  Westlake,  Downtown Los Angeles,  Warehouse District,  Hancock Park,  Bunker Hill,  Elysian Park,  FIDM,  Arlington Heights,  Little Tokyo,  Silver Lake,  Downtown LA Apartments,  Downtown LA Housing,  Historic Core,  University of Southern California Apartments,  Jewelry District,  Arts District,  Hollywood,  Downtown Housing,  Financial District,  Mid-City,  Industrial District,  Echo Park,  Central Los Angeles Housing,  South Park,  Hollywood Hills West,  Central LA,  Central Los Angeles,  Downtown Los Angeles Apartments,  Griffith Park,  Old Bank District,  Hollywood Hills,  Los Angeles Apartments,  DTLA Apartments,  Koreatown,  Windsor Square,  Carthay,  FIDM Housing,  DTLA Housing,  DT Los Angeles Housing,  Chinatown,  Downtown Los Angeles Housing,  Larchmont,  Luxury Apartments,  Fashion Institute,  DT Los Angeles,  East Hollywood,  Wholesale District,  University of Southern California Housing,  Student Housing,  Gallery Row,  FIDM Apartments,  Student Apartments,  Downtown Apartments,  Los Feliz,  Fashion District,  Fashion Institute Housing,  USC Housing, Downtown,  Central Los Angeles Apartments,  Central LA Apartments,  Luxury Housing,  DTLA,  University of Southern California,  Pico-Union,  Los Angeles Housing']
